name: ezno
description: A JavaScript compiler and TypeScript checker written in Rust with a focus on static analysis and runtime performance

scripts.build: wasm-pack build --dev --out-dir src/js-cli-and-library/build --target web --no-pack && npm run build-js
scripts.build-release: wasm-pack build --release --out-dir src/js-cli-and-library/build --target web --no-pack && npm run build-js
scripts.build-manual-bind: cargo build --lib --target wasm32-unknown-unknown --profile debug && wasm-bindgen --out-dir build --target web ../../target/wasm32-unknown-unknown/debug/ezno_lib.wasm && npm run build-js
scripts.build-js: unbuild && cp ./build/ezno_lib_bg.wasm dist/shared && cp src/cli_node.cjs dist/cli.cjs
scripts.test: npm run build && npm run run-tests
